about_the_game:
You grip your club, a beautiful sunflower putter, and take a breath. You pause for a moment to look around. The seas are serene today. Focusing on the tee, you line up your club with the pineapple and cut a perfect shot through the air. Suddenly a floppy shark smacks it and now you’re out of bounds. Blast that bouncing shark, and blast your so-called friend who dropped it there.

Fruit Golf is an asymmetrical virtual reality (VR) miniature golf game where the balls are fruit and your friends wreak havoc on the course! A fun and accessible party game for VR newcomers and veterans alike, all you need is one headset and some friends.

One player puts on the headset to play a round of miniature golf in wacky environments like a kitchen counter or the castle of the vampiric blood orange. Then by using a free companion app for smartphones or tablets, everyone else gets to work dropping goofy obstacles like salt and pepper shakers, explosive barrels, and that blasted bouncy shark. But beware… once the next player steps onto the green, it’s payback time. It’s zany! It’s chaos! It’s da cherry bomb!

Every round is different. Every round is ridiculous. Fruit Golf is a whole basket full of fun.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing or Room Scale

short_description: In the wacky world of Fruit Golf, your ball is replaced by fruit as you mini-golf your way through ridiculous, larger-than-life courses. Seamlessly blending VR and mobile, Fruit Golf offers a unique and hilarious experience for players of all ages and only requires one headset for the whole party.
